review: I'm a late bloomer when it comes to techno savvy. My phone isn't smart. The Fire TV stick was necessary because my digital, hd tv was not on the list of apparati that readily accepted the opportunity of Amazon's Amazing offer of free streaming..... .Now that I'm retired I have a kinder, simpler life and like to do exactly what I want and didn't want my mind bent or even concerned with complicated electronics.  After 2 letters from Amazon I finally took advantage of  Prime's offer of free movies, t.v. and music and purchased the Fire TV Stick. With a little help from Amazon I got it installed within minutes of receiving it. It seems all they told me it was. If you have Prime, you won't pay for these privileges so don't pass this up! I used 'chat' for a little kind Amazon assistance and also got a 1 time $20 discount on the stick . Don't know why I waited so long.
author: Danelle Libhart Acord
